characters.story: Like a tree, this character means banyan and asks "Rohng? Epiphyte?"!
The shellfish stands for prize, whispering "Shahng" softly - a vivid image to remember!
An striking symbol for attempt that asks "Chahng? Try?" curiously!
See how the mouth forms taste? It asks "Chahng? Sample?" curiously!
See how the hand forms palm of the hand? It whispers "Jahng" softly!
See how the hand forms fend off? It whispers "Dahng" softly!

Like soil, this character means slope and sings "Pwoh!" - a vivid image to remember!
The hand stands for drape over the shoulders, singing "Pee!" cheerfully!
Picture the other taking form - it whispers "Bee" with vivid energy!
"Joh!" Hay bales covered everything sharply - wrinkles, creases and furrows!
"Choo, is that a baby bird?" Hay bales questioned the turkey curiously - a chick, fledgling!
"Chyoo!" Walking on hay bales sang cheerfully - hasten, hurry and tend toward!
The strokes unite to show spinach, singing "Bwo!" cheerfully!

When the heart meets the ear, they form shame, whispering "Chir" softly!
The strokes unite to show edit, asking "Jee? Compile?" curiously!

See how the hand forms lend a hand? It asks "Foo? Support?" curiously!
Picture fire beside a mouth: that's splendid, singing "Shee!" cheerfully!

"Shyoon!" Thousand black muscles sang cheerfully - merit, achievement and honor!

Like a heart, this character means chasten and asks "Chung? Punish?"!
"Shyoon, should we follow?" The queue and shield questioned compliance curiously - abide by custom!
"Chuh!" Going to bring about commanded sharply - thorough, complete and penetrating!
The strokes unite to show service, shouting "Yee!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The water stands for develop, whispering "Yahn" softly like ripples spreading across a pond!
